text: "City Flat" is a song by Australian rock band Boom Crash Opera, released in 1987 as the third single from their self-titled studio album. The song peaked at number 42 in Australia.Australian Music Database == Track listing == # "City Flat" (Peter Farnan, Richard Pleasance) – 4:02 # "Spirit of Progress" (Peter Farnan, Richard Pleasance, Dale Ryder, Peter Maslen) – 3:51 # "City Flat" (Extended Mix) (Peter Farnan, Richard Pleasance) – 6:34 == Personnel == * Peter Farnan – guitar, vocals * Peter Maslen – drums, vocals * Greg O'Connor – keyboards * Richard Pleasance – guitar, bass, vocals * Dale Ryder – lead vocals == Charts == {| class="wikitable" !Year !Chart !Position |- |1987 |Australian Kent Music Report Singles Chart |42David Kent's Australian Chart Book: based on the Kent Music Report |- |} == References == == External links == * City Flat (12" single) * City Flat (7" single) Category:1987 songs Category:1987 singles Category:Boom Crash Opera songs Category:Warner Music Group singles Category:Songs written by Richard Pleasance
title: City Flat
